definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Her tears washed away the paint from her face.
sentences.chinese: 泪水把她脸上的脂粉都冲掉了。

sentences.english: Her tears washed away the paint from her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的泪水把脸上的脂粉都洗掉了。

sentences.english: She opened her handbag and began to repair her face.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提包，开始往脸上重敷脂粉。
玛丽稍稍涂了一点脂粉。

sentences.english: Julie had rouged my cheeks, for otherwise I should have looked like a corpse.
sentences.chinese: 朱利替我抹了脂粉，否则我真有点儿像一具尸体了。

sentences.english: I never saw that you did painting need.
sentences.chinese: 我从不认为你需要脂粉敷面。

sentences.english: She laid the paint on thickly.
sentences.chinese: 她浓浓地抹了一层脂粉。

sentences.english: Stirred by a painted beauty to his verse.
sentences.chinese: 只知运用脂粉涂抹他的诗句。

sentences.english: She looked into the mirror and began to repair her face.
sentences.chinese: 她向镜中望去，开始往脸上重敷脂粉。

sentences.english: He kissed all my face power off.
sentences.chinese: 他把我脸上的脂粉都吻掉了。
